#summary Protocol Definition of Web API

= Introduction =

This project offers RESTful API. The data format is JSON.

But CSV data format downloading  is also supported.

= Rest Details =
== JSON ==
|| || Method || Other Requirement || Response ||
|| Create || POST /rest/{resource}/{data group}.json || Request Header "Content-Type application/json" and Request Body(JSON Format)|| Added One Record ||
|| Read || GET  /rest/{resource}/{data group}.json || - || All Records ||
|| Update || PUT  /rest/{resource}/{data group}/{id}.json || Request Header "Content-Type application/json" and Request Body(JSON Format)|| Updated One Record ||
|| Delete || PUT  /rest/{resource}/{data group}/{id}.json || - || Deleted One Record ||

== CSV ==

|| || Method || Other Requirement ||
|| Create || POST /rest/{resource}/{data group}.csv || Request Header "Content-Type text/plain" and Request Body(Query String)||
|| Read || GET  /rest/{resource}/{data group}.csv || - ||
|| Update || PUT  /rest/{resource}/{data group}/{id}.csv || Request Header "Content-Type text/plain" and Request Body(Query String)||
|| Delete || PUT  /rest/{resource}/{data group}/{id}.csv || - ||
